about.title: About
about.subtitle: We are a team of artificial intelligence experts who help businesses use AI capabilities to solve real problems and achieve specific results.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content1: Make artificial intelligence accessible and useful for every business. We believe that AI should solve real problems and bring measurable benefits.
mission.content2: Our goal is not just to implement technologies, but to create sustainable competitive advantage for our clients through smart automation and process optimization.

questions.q: How long does the program last?
questions.a: 5-6 weeks of intensive training with flexible schedule. You can combine with your main job.
Basic API understanding is desirable, but we teach from scratch. The main thing is motivation and desire to learn.

questions.q: Will there be support after graduation?
questions.a: Yes! Access to graduate community, monthly webinars and priority technical support.
Our graduates earn from ₸100k in the first month to ₸500k+ after six months.
We help find first clients and can offer cooperation with NeuroBoost.
Yes, installment plans are available for 3-6 months without overpayments for Kazakhstan residents.

academy.disclaimer: NeuroBoost certificate is not a state-issued document.

questions.q: Can I try the solution before buying?
questions.a: We offer demo versions and pilot projects so you can evaluate the solution's effectiveness.

questions.a: Yes, we have solutions for companies of any size — from startups to large corporations.
